question: Boosting performance of Angular applications with manual change detection
shortAnswer: Angular uses NgZone/Zone.js to know when to trigger UI update (change detection) when our app data state changes. It brilliantly utilized the events emitted by Zone.js when async operations are performed to detect when to run a change detection cycle.

question: The Extensive Guide to Creating Streams in RxJS
